name: ornld
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1)), w2))

stmt.origin: expimpd(w0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1), w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1)), w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wi(wn(w1), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1)), w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wi(wn(w1), w2))

stmt.origin: ord(wa(w0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wo(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1)), w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wo(w1, w2))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(w0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wo(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1)), w2))

comment: Selecting one statement from a disjunction if one of the disjuncted statements is false. (Contributed by AV, 6-Sep-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 13-Oct-2018.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Jan-2020.)
